statistical_tests.interpretation: After adjusting for confounding factors, there is NO statistically significant association between gestational diabetes and hearing loss (p = 0.348).
Chi-square test confirms no significant association in univariate analysis (p = 0.345).

effect_size.interpretation: Negligible effect size, indicating no meaningful association.

clinical_context.baseline_risk: Hearing loss affects approximately 3.2 per 1000 births in the general population.
clinical_context.number_needed_to_harm: No increased risk - confidence interval includes null
clinical_context.clinical_significance: No clinical significance. Gestational diabetes does not independently increase hearing loss risk.
